name: Agent Run And Dash In Vector City 2 - Best vector game for iPhone
name_original: Agent Run And Dash In Vector City 2 - Best vector game for iPhone
description:
————One of the most thrilling and exciting gameplay that would boost you————

The agent is on to move forward escaping the gangsters that have caught him detecting their secret agency.

Now it’s upto you to make him escape till he survives.

Gameplay :

• Tap to jump
• Hold longer to jump higher

Sounds really cool. Do download it and have crazy fun in spare hours!!!
